sys_embedded_help_content.content:
Map Sources

The Map Sources list contains all the map sources in your instance. A map source configures data to be displayed in a map report.

Click the column headers to search, sort, filter, and edit data.

Click New to create a new map source.

The Map Sources list has the following columns:
  • Name – The name of the map source, including the name of the map source level.
  • Table – The source table of the map.
  • Field – The field which is the source of the mapped data.
  • Level – The hierarchy level of the map source. Each map source level corresponds to a drill level on the map hierarchy, and these levels much match. Each level must exist in a hierarchy only once.
  • Parent – The parent map for this map. The parent-child relationships define drill levels in a map hierarchy.
  • Use these mappings – The mapping group used to transform data. For example, if you are transforming field value USA to hc-key value us, select Country mappings, which contains the relevant key-value pair mapping.
Related information
Customize a map source level
sys_embedded_help_content.name: sys_report_map_source_list-normal
